com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.connection

Interface RemoteKontaktDeviceConnection<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type parameter

    public interface RemoteKontaktDeviceConnection<T>
    Interface describing connection to the remote device.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes connection to the device.
      boolean connect()
      sends connection request to the device.
      T getDevice()
      Provides remote device that the connection is established with.
      boolean isAuthenticated()
      Provides information whether the remote device has been authenticated.
      boolean isClosed()
      Provides information whether the connection to the remote device is established.
      boolean isConnected()
      Provides information whether connection is established to the device.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect()
        sends connection request to the device.
        Returns:
        the boolean

      • close

        void close()
        Closes connection to the device.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Provides information whether connection is established to the device.
        Returns:
        true if connection to the device is established

      • isAuthenticated

        boolean isAuthenticated()
        Provides information whether the remote device has been authenticated.
        Returns:
        true if the remote device has been authenticated.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Provides information whether the connection to the remote device is established.
        Returns:
        the boolean

      • getDevice

        T getDevice()
        Provides remote device that the connection is established with.
        Returns:
        the device
